util Package¶

decorators Module¶

decorators¶

General purpose decorators.

jackalope.util.decorators.constant(f)[source]¶

Convert function to a constant variable.

dev Module¶

dev¶

Tools for development.

jackalope.util.dev.obj_to_dict(obj, classkey=None)[source]¶
jackalope.util.dev.print_obj(obj, classkey=None)[source]¶
jackalope.util.dev.print_timing(func)[source]¶

Debug decorator to see how long functions take.

integer Module¶

integer¶

An all-purpose module for working with integers.

jackalope.util.integer.to_integer(anything)[source]¶

Convert anything to a string using ‘int()’ but return an None if None.

string Module¶

string¶

A all-purpose module for working with strings.

jackalope.util.string.to_string(anything)[source]¶

Convert anything to a string using str() but return an empty string if None.
